document_data.name: Alanza DaNosta
document_data.mainbody: '''Alanza DaNosta''' was a member of the [[Golden Legion]].
document_data.Personality: DaNosta was well known for his greed. He plotted to gain such a large amount of [[gold]] that nobody would notice the trifling amount that he diverted for himself.
document_data.History:
DaNosta was appointed as commander of the garrison of [[Fort Cordell]] by the [[Amn]]ian government. He spent most of his time cataloguing all the mistakes he felt had been made by Governor [[Cordell]], especially his leniency to the [[Payit (ethnicity)|Payit]].

In [[1362 DR]], he tried to convince the adventuring party hired by [[Drakosa]] to find the [[Cloak of One Plume]] to instead give it to him after recovered it.
